item.title: Colophon
item.description: This blog is managed with a monolithic org file representing all posts and Hugo managing the generation of the HTML. Some people just manage their blogs using org directly but using Hugo as an intermediary makes some things like theming easier and allows me to continue to work in org for my blog. This post goes over the major moving parts. Hugo Installation If you are on a Mac, installation is very simple.
